Detailed Description

Error handling.

CVL functions set an error status if something goes wrong. Subsequent calls to CVL functions will do nothing if an error status is set. The application can query the error status and act accordingly. In case of non-fatal errors, the application can reset the error status.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum cvl_error_t

The CVL error status.

Enumerator:
CVL_OK  No error.
CVL_ERROR_MEM  Memory allocation failure.
CVL_ERROR_GL  Failure of the GL library.
CVL_ERROR_IO  Input/output error.
CVL_ERROR_DATA  Data format error.
CVL_ERROR_SYS  Operating system error.
CVL_ERROR_ASSERT  An assertion failed. Probably caused by invalid arguments to a function.
